original: Naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
Naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
Naniyatañca naaniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
